sentence.Network_en: The parvenu invited guests but they all hung off.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个暴发户邀请了客人,但是他们都不愿意去.

sentence.Network_en: The parvenu was much too foxy to let slip even a hint of his working - class background.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴发户十分狡猾,他决不暴露自己是工人出身这一事实.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, literally arrived', past participle of parvenir, from Latin pervenire 'come to, reach'

entry.def: If you describe someone as a parvenu, you think that although they have acquired wealth or high status they are not very cultured or well-educated.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who has suddenly risen to a higher economic status but has not gained social acceptance of others in that class
1. characteristic of someone who has risen economically or socially but lacks the social skills appropriate for this new position
2. of or characteristic of a parvenu

auth_sentence.content: Napoleon...had now re-established France's reputation among the other crowned heads as a parvenu.
